bill.summary: 4/27/2005--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideas of National Child Care Worthy Wage Day. Urges public officials and the general public to: (1) honor early-childhood educators and programs in their communities; and (2) work together to resolve the early-childhood educator compensation crisis.
